info.name: CollabMedia Video Upload API
info.description: API collection for uploading videos with text content to create video posts

formdata.description: Video file to upload (supports: MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, FLV, MKV, M4V, WebM)

formdata.value: This is my amazing video post! Check out this cool content I created. #video #awesome #content
formdata.description: Text content for the video post

formdata.value: A video showcasing amazing content creation

formdata.description: Privacy setting: PublicWithName, PublicWithoutName, OnlyForOwner, InvitedFriends

request.description: Upload a video file with text content to create a video post. The system will automatically convert the video to optimized MP4 format, generate thumbnails, and store everything in S3.

response.name: Successful Video Upload

formdata.value: This is my amazing video post!

formdata.value: Uploading a high-quality MP4 video with detailed description and hashtags. #mp4 #video #quality #content

request.description: Upload an MP4 video file. The system will analyze the quality and only convert if optimization is needed.

formdata.description: AVI video file (will be automatically converted to MP4)

formdata.value: Uploading an AVI video that will be automatically converted to optimized MP4 format for better compatibility and smaller file size. #avi #conversion #optimization

request.description: Upload an AVI video file. The system will automatically convert it to optimized MP4 format.

formdata.description: MOV video file (will be automatically converted to MP4)

formdata.value: Uploading a MOV video from iPhone/QuickTime that will be converted to web-optimized MP4 format. #mov #iphone #quicktime #conversion

request.description: Upload a MOV video file. The system will automatically convert it to optimized MP4 format.

formdata.value: Uploading a WebM video file. The system will analyze and optimize if needed for better web compatibility. #webm #web #optimization

request.description: Upload a WebM video file. The system will analyze the quality and convert if optimization is needed.

formdata.value: This is a private video post that only I can see. #private #personal #video

request.description: Upload a video for a private post that only the owner can see.

item.name: Video Upload - Public Post with Name

formdata.value: This is a public video post that everyone can see with my name attached. #public #video #community #sharing

request.description: Upload a video for a public post that everyone can see with the uploader's name.

item.name: Video Upload - Public Post without Name

formdata.description: Video file for anonymous public post

formdata.value: This is a public video post that everyone can see but my name will be hidden. #public #anonymous #video #privacy

request.description: Upload a video for a public post that everyone can see but without showing the uploader's name.

formdata.value: Uploading a video with specific group tags for better categorization and discovery. #video #tags #categorization #discovery

request.description: Upload a video with specific group tags for better categorization and discovery.

formdata.value: Testing upload of a large video file to see how the system handles compression and optimization. #large #file #test #compression #optimization

request.description: Test upload of a large video file to see compression and optimization results.
